text: Ajai Vasudev is a film director active in the Malayalam film industry. He is well known for his debut film RajadhiRaja which was released on 5 September 2014. ==Film career== He made his directional movie debut through the Malayalam movie RajadhiRaja which was released on 5 September 2014. His second movie again with Mammootty is Masterpiece (2017 film). Now set to team up for the third time with the same actor in Shylock (2020 film). ==Filmography== {| class=wikitable |- !
